newsitem.title: FRANCE: Renault Megane voted European car of year.
newsitem.headline: Renault Megane voted European car of year.

text.p: Renault's Megane Scenic won the 1997 European Car of the Year title on Tuesday, ahead of Ford's Ka minicar in a poll of European motoring journalists, the French daily L'Equipe said.

The title, by a jury of 55 journalists from 21 countries, was Renault's fourth since the award was created in 1963. The poll was organised by L'Equipe, Autopista, Autovisie, AM, Stern, the Sunday Express and Vi Bilagare.
The Megane Scenic, a single-body car with the proportions of a minivan, won 405 points in the poll to 293 for the Ka. Volkswagen AG's Passat was third on 248.
